::Kluster/Grimmer/Scyther::

Kluster is nearly hit by a shot on his way to the injured Maximals,
turning and seeing the nearest enemy. He fires two plasma shots at
Choran, jogging toward him. A grenade comes from nowhere and blows up
at his feet, sending him flying backwards and falling over.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler fires several more shots at Headstrong, running toward him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther smiles as he sees one of his grenades hit a bot, and fires two
more down at him, his target being Kluster.
